items.title: Watch: Meteor lights up sky over Japan's Mount Fuji
items.description: The meteor could be seen blazing through the night sky over Japan's Mount Fuji

items.title: Poland scrambles jets as Russia strikes Kyiv before US-Ukraine peace talks
items.description: Poland's military says its air force took a "preventative" response to secure its airspace.

items.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree ceasefire after weeks of deadly clashes
items.description: Almost one million people have been displaced since hostilities resumed earlier this month.

items.title: Thousands of US flights disrupted as winter storm looms
items.description: Heavy snow is expected in New York and southern Connecticut during one of the busiest travel weekends of the year.

items.title: One general, one mathematician: The men competing for power in two African elections
items.description: The leaders of Guinea and the Central African Republic aim to consolidate power after Sunday's polls.
